cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

Class Story

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure.Story
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Story
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Story object, basic functional unit for a story. Has title, author, description, and first page attributes. Aggregates History, FragmentList, and ChoiceMap objects. - History tracks reader progress - FragmentList is the container for the Fragments (Pages) of the story - ChoiceMap stores the choices and associates for the Fragments
    Author:
    Jesse Chu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addFragment

        public java.lang.Integer addFragment(StoryFragment newFragment)
        Places a new fragment into the FragmentList. A new ID is automatically generated for each fragment.
        Parameters:
        newFragment - The StoryFragment to add to StoryFragmentList
        Returns:
        the ID given to the added StoryFragment

      • removeFragment

        public boolean removeFragment(java.lang.Integer id)
        Removes a requested Fragment from the FragmentList. Returns boolean based on success/failure.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Fragment to remove
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • updateFragment

                     StoryFragment fragment)

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Fragment in to updated
        fragment - Fragment to update to

      • addChoice

        public void addChoice(int fragmentId,
             Choice choice)
        Adds a new given Choice to a StoryFragment (by ID)
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of StoryFragment to add Choice to
        choice - Choice object to add to the ChoiceMap

      • deleteChoice

        public boolean deleteChoice(int fragmentId,
                   int index)
        Removes a choice from the ChoiceMap, using a given StoryFragment ID and index
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of StoryFragment where choice is located
        index - Index of the choice to remove
        Returns:
        Returns true if choice existed, otherwise returns false

      • updateChoice

        public boolean updateChoice(int fragmentId,
                   int index,
                   Choice choice)
        Updates a Choice for a given StoryFragment with a new given Choice, using its index
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of StoryFragment where choice is located
        index - Index of choice to change
        choice - New choice to put in there
        Returns:
        Returns true if choice already existed, false otherwise

      • cleanFragmentReferences

        public void cleanFragmentReferences(int fragmentId)
        Used to remove all references to a given StoryFragment ID. Should be called when a StoryFragment is deleted.
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of StoryFragment to remove references to

      • getChoices

        public java.util.ArrayList<Choice> getChoices(int fragmentId)
        Returns an ArrayList of all Choices for a given StoryFragment ID Entries are sorted by destination StoryFragment ID
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of StoryFragment to get the choices for
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Choice objects for the given StoryFragment ID

      • getMostRecent

        public java.lang.Integer getMostRecent()
        Returns the ID of the last-viewed Story Fragment. If History is empty, returns null.
        Returns:
        Integer ID of last-viewed fragment

      • goBack

        public java.lang.Integer goBack()
        Removes the most recent StoryFragment ID from the stack, and returns the previous StoryFragment ID. When there is no previous ID to return, returns null.
        Returns:
        StoryFragmentID of previous StoryFragment

      • pushToStack

        public void pushToStack(java.lang.Integer fragmentId)
        Pushes a StoryFragment ID onto the History Stack. Should be called for every new StoryFragment viewed.
        Parameters:
        fragment_id - ID of StoryFragment to be pushed to stack

      • clearHistory

        public void clearHistory()
        Clears the History stack. Used when a user decides to start a new reading session.
